text:
Hey team, trying to build a simple webapp that receives an XML feed and updates HUBDB based on:

1) Add new record if webapp-DB does not have HubSpot ID
2) Update if feed latest modified is greater than webapp-DB last updated
3) Set Boolean Value archive if value in feed is archived or missing

We've had some issues in our team approaching this project; would love to get some feedback on how you'd handle this task?
